message:
Hi Stephen,

I try to index my pdb's with SVN, but always get the "zero source files found". On my first computer I also get an error "Unable to resolve directory", which happens apparantly in the file [svn.pm](http://svn.pm "svn.pm") on line 128 : "  
 if ( ! open($hProcess, "dir $SourceRoot 2>&1 |") )   
", so it looks like it is impossible to open a pipe for getting the output of the dir command in the source directory.

On my second computer I don't get this, but the indexing only works if I type the svnindex command in the directory where the source is, which is a problem when the source is in different locations.

Any ideas?

I'm using the WDK8.1 on Win7-64 with svn1.9 and active perl, all in 32-bit.

Best regards,

Luc
